Welcome new blog

18/05/2012

A long time ago, I started blogging on another domain, but I’ve stopped a long time ago.

Now I want to start again, but I need a new experience, then, I pick jekyll, setup it, draw it, and now I’m ready for a new blog. The old posts will not be moved to this one, but will still available at the blogspot.

See you soon.
